main event: An object believed to be a meteor was sighted at Centennial Ranger Station on December 8, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for only 1 second., The object was very bright and at a very high altitude., The object had tremendous speed., The report includes comments suggesting it could have been a balloon or aircraft., The conclusion is that it was probably an astronomical meteor.
sighted object: very bright object moving at high speed
witness description: sighting made by a district official
